name: MyCarePlan
0:
”Alexa, open My Care Plan”
”Alexa, ask My Care Plan what does full code mean?”
”Alexa, ask My Care Plan what is comfort care?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my care plan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Care Plan’s Annie can answer frequently asked questions surrounding advance care planning, including going over the various types of forms and comprehensive descriptions of the types of care one can choose to have or not have. Annie can answer questions like:

What is comfort care?
What is an advance directive?
How do I talk to my doctor about my goals of care? 

Annie can even help you capture an advance directive.
